title: Going to London
content:
So, I'll be a week away. I'm leaving to London tomorrow evening. I'll be back the next Saturday I think. I'm going with my family.

Anyone know anything I absolutely should see there? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Going to London
content:
Brithish museum, to see one of the hugest and awesomest ancient Egyptian artifact collections.

Well, that's where I would go to...

And it's free, no need to buy tickets/[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-british.gif[/img] -----------------
[img]http://www.geocities.com/anthalerero/pic/banner_eurovision.jpg[/img]

title: I see london, i see france...
content:
*gets ready to party*

G314: 3, 2, 1...

KR: Oops, forgot something. *comes back* hey, what are you doing?!

G314: Uh, getting ready to celebrate... uh, your return? yeah.

KR: Oh, ok. *leaves*

G314: YEAH PARTY!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img] -Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: I see Captain Underpants
content:
Go to the [url=http://www.londoneye.com/]London Eye[/url]! It's this big rotating observation wheel, and you can see almost all of London from it. Avoid it if you have vertigo or claustrophobia, though...

Also, Buckingham Palace is pretty cool. And don't miss all the passed-out window-smashing drunk people on the London Underground!

Ah heh heh heh. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img] [url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]

content:

title: Adios
content:
Thanks Z! Hope to see you later at #keeners. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

This is my last message until I come back. Leaving in an hour.. Bye! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-british.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
